overview: Mr. ROBERT Carlson is responsible for the team that is developing Alpine Data lab’s rich partner network and sales success across industries. Prior to joining the company, Rob ran sales for the Western United States for Greenplum, aquired by EMC to form the foundation of its Data Computing Division. In this role, he was responsible for sales teams that consistently exceeded revenue goals. Mr. Carlson comes to Alpine Data Labs with over 15 years of enterprise sales experience and leadership roles in companies that include Business Objects/SAP and PeopleSoft. Rob holds a BA in Behavioral Science from the University of Utah.
